channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple Single Sign On

item.title: CVE-2022-2083|2024-08-03T00:24:44.125Z -- unknown -- simple%20single%20sign%20on
item.description: The Simple Single Sign On WordPress plugin through 4.1.0 leaks its OAuth client_secret, which could be used by attackers to gain unauthorized access to the site.
